atk-s0402a31:2_0: 124. Tatiyassa paṭhame kusinārāyanti evaṁnāmake nagare. Baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍeti evaṁnāmake
atk-s0402a31:2_1: vanasaṇḍe. Tattha kira bhūtabalikaraṇatthaṁ baliṁ haranti, tasmā baliharaṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a31:2_2: Ākaṅkhamānoti icchamāno. Sahatthāti sahatthena. Sampavāretīti alaṁ alanti vācāya
atk-s0402a31:2_3: ceva hatthavikārena ca paṭikkhipāpeti. Sādhu vata māyanti sādhu vata maṁ ayaṁ. Gathitoti
atk-s0402a31:2_4: taṇhāgedhena gathito. Mucchitoti taṇhāmucchanāyayeva mucchito. Ajjhopannoti taṇhāya
atk-s0402a31:2_5: gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā pavatto. Anissaraṇapaññoti chandarāgaṁ pahāya saṁkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0402a31:2_6: paribhuñjanto nissaraṇapañño nāma hoti, ayaṁ na tādiso, sacchandarāgo paribhuñjatīti
atk-s0402a31:2_7: anissaraṇapañño. Sukkapakkho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. Nekkhammavitakkādayo panettha
atk-s0402a31:4: 125. Dutiye pajahiṁsūti pajahanti. Bahulamakaṁsūti punappunaṁ karonti. Idhāpi tayo vitakkā missakāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a31:6_0: 126. Tatiye gotamake cetiyeti gotamakayakkhassa bhavane. Tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṁ
atk-s0402a31:6_1: vīsati vassāni kadāci cāpāle cetiye, kadāci sārandade, kadāci bahuputte, kadāci gotamaketi
atk-s0402a31:6_2: evaṁ yebhuyyena devakulesuyeva vihāsi. Imasmiṁ pana kāle vesāliṁ upanissāya gotamakassa
atk-s0402a31:6_3: yakkhassa bhavanaṭṭhāne vihāsi. Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘gotamake cetiye’’ti. Etadavocāti
atk-s0402a31:7_0: Idañca bhagavatā suttaṁ atthuppattiyaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Kataraatthuppattiyanti?
atk-s0402a31:7_1: Mūlapariyāyaatthuppattiyaṁ (ma. ni. 1.1 ādayo). Sambahulā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā
atk-s0402a31:7_2: attanā uggahitabuddhavacanaṁ nissāya jānanamadaṁ uppādetvā dhammassavanaggaṁ na gacchanti
atk-s0402a31:7_3: – ‘‘sammāsambuddho kathento amhehi ñātameva kathessati, no aññāta’’nti. Bhikkhū tathāgatassa
atk-s0402a31:7_4: ārocesuṁ. Satthā te bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā mukhapaṭiññaṁ gahetvā mūlapariyāyaṁ desesi.
atk-s0402a31:7_5: Te bhikkhū desanāya neva āgataṭṭhānaṁ, na gataṭṭhānaṁ addasaṁsu. Apassantā ‘‘sammāsambuddho
atk-s0402a31:7_6: ‘mayhaṁ kathā niyyātī’ti mukhasampattameva kathetī’’ti cintayiṁsu. Satthā tesaṁ manaṁ
atk-s0402a31:8_0: Tattha abhiññāyāti ‘‘ime pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, bāvīsatindriyāni,
atk-s0402a31:8_1: cattāri saccāni, nava hetū, satta phassā, satta vedanā, satta cetanā, satta saññā,
atk-s0402a31:8_2: satta cittānī’’ti jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṁ katvā, tathā – ‘‘ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā
atk-s0402a31:8_3: nayena te te dhamme jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhameva katvāti attho. Sanidānanti
atk-s0402a31:8_4: sappaccayameva katvā kathemi, no appaccayaṁ. Sappāṭihāriyanti paccanīkapaṭiharaṇena
atk-s0402a31:8_5: sappāṭihāriyameva katvā kathemi, no appāṭihāriyaṁ. Alañca pana voti yuttañca pana
atk-s0402a31:8_6: tumhākaṁ. Tuṭṭhiyāti ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti
atk-s0402a31:8_7: tīṇi ratanāni guṇato anussarantānaṁ tumhākaṁ yuttameva tuṭṭhiṁ kātunti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a31:9_0: Akampitthāti chahi ākārehi akampittha. Evarūpo hi pathavikampo bodhimaṇḍepi ahosi.
atk-s0402a31:9_1: Bodhisatte kira dakkhiṇadisābhāgena bodhimaṇḍaṁ abhiruḷhe dakkhiṇadisābhāgo heṭṭhā
atk-s0402a31:9_2: avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi, uttarabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto viya. Pacchimadisaṁ
atk-s0402a31:9_3: gate pacchimabhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi, pācīnabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṁ
atk-s0402a31:9_4: abhihananto viya. Uttaradisaṁ gate uttaradisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya,
atk-s0402a31:9_5: dakkhiṇadisābhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto viya. Pācīnadisaṁ gate pācīnadisābhāgo
atk-s0402a31:9_6: heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya, pacchimabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto viya.
atk-s0402a31:9_7: Bodhirukkhopi sakiṁ heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya, sakiṁ uggantvā bhavaggaṁ abhihananto
atk-s0402a31:9_8: viya. Tasmimpi divase evaṁ chahi ākārehi cakkavāḷasahassī mahāpathavī akampittha.
atk-s0402a31:11_0: 127. Catutthe kevalakappanti sakalakappaṁ. Anvāhiṇḍantoti vicaranto. Nāddasāti kiṁ
atk-s0402a31:11_1: kāraṇā na addasa? Ayaṁ kira bharaṇḍu kālāmo sakyānaṁ aggapiṇḍaṁ khādanto vicarati.
atk-s0402a31:11_2: Tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṁ sampattakāle ekā dhammadesanā samuṭṭhahissatīti ñatvā bhagavā
atk-s0402a31:11_3: evaṁ adhiṭṭhāsi, yathā añño āvasatho na paññāyittha. Tasmā na addasa. Purāṇasabrahmacārīti
atk-s0402a31:11_4: porāṇako sabrahmacārī. So kira āḷārakālāmakāle tasmiṁyeva assame ahosi, taṁ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0402a31:11_5: Santharaṁ paññāpehīti santharitabbaṁ santharāhīti attho. Santharaṁ paññāpetvāti kappiyamañcake
atk-s0402a31:11_6: paccattharaṇaṁ paññāpetvā. Kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññāpetīti ettha pariññā nāma samatikkamo,
atk-s0402a31:11_7: tasmā kāmānaṁ samatikkamaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ paññāpeti. Na rūpānaṁ pariññanti rūpānaṁ
atk-s0402a31:11_8: samatikkamabhūtaṁ arūpāvacarasamāpattiṁ na paññāpeti. Na vedanānaṁ pariññanti vedanānaṁ
atk-s0402a31:11_9: samatikkamaṁ nibbānaṁ na paññāpeti. Niṭṭhāti gati nipphatti. Udāhu puthūti udāhu nānā.
atk-s0402a31:13_0: 128. Pañcame abhikkantāya rattiyāti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanādīsu
atk-s0402a31:13_1: dissati. Tattha ‘‘abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno
atk-s0402a31:13_2: bhikkhusaṅgho, uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkha’’nti evamādīsu khaye
atk-s0402a31:13_3: dissati. ‘‘Ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’’ti evamādīsu
atk-s0402a31:14: ‘‘Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṁ;
atk-s0402a31:15: Abhikkantena vaṇṇena, sabbā obhāsayaṁ disā’’ti. (vi. va. 857) –
atk-s0402a31:16_0: Evamādīsu abhirūpe. ‘‘Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotamā’’ti evamādīsu (pārā. 15) abbhanumodane.
atk-s0402a31:16_1: Idha pana sundare. Tena abhikkantāya rattiyāti iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya rattiyāti
atk-s0402a31:16_2: vuttaṁ hoti. Abhikkantavaṇṇāti idha abhikkantasaddo abhirūpe, vaṇṇasaddo pana chavithutikulavaggakāraṇasaṇṭhānapamāṇarūpāyatanādīsu
atk-s0402a31:16_3: dissati. Tattha ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni. 2.399; su. ni. 553)
atk-s0402a31:16_4: chaviyaṁ. ‘‘Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā’’ti evamādīsu
atk-s0402a31:16_5: (ma. ni. 2.77) thutiyaṁ. ‘‘Cattārome, bho gotama, vaṇṇā’’ti evamādīsu (dī. ni. 3.115)
atk-s0402a31:16_6: kulavagge. ‘‘Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0402a31:16_9: gandho raso ojā’’ti evamādīsu rūpāyatane. So idha chaviyā daṭṭhabbo. Tena abhikkantavaṇṇāti
atk-s0402a31:17_2: anavasesatā attho. ‘‘Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya
atk-s0402a31:17_4: samudayo hotī’’ti evamādīsu (vibha. 225) abyāmissatā. ‘‘Kevalaṁ saddhāmattakaṁ nūna
atk-s0402a31:17_6: bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṁ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito’’ti evamādīsu (a. ni.
atk-s0402a31:17_8: ni. 3.57) visaṁyogo. Idha pana anavasesatā atthoti adhippetā.
atk-s0402a31:18_1: Tathā hissa ‘‘okappaniyametaṁ bhoto gotamassa, yathā taṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’’ti
atk-s0402a31:18_2: evamādīsu (ma. ni. 1.387) abhisaddahanamattho. ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi
atk-s0402a31:18_3: phalaṁ paribhuñjitu’’nti evamādīsu (cūḷava. 250) vohāro. ‘‘Yena sudaṁ niccakappaṁ
atk-s0402a31:18_4: viharāmī’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni. 1.387) kālo. ‘‘Iccāyasmā kappo’’ti evamādīsu (su.
atk-s0402a31:18_8: evamādīsu (a. ni. 8.80) leso. ‘‘Kevalakappaṁ veḷuvanaṁ obhāsetvā’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ.
atk-s0402a31:18_9: ni. 1.94) samantabhāvo. Idha panassa samantabhāvo attho adhippeto. Tasmā kevalakappaṁ
atk-s0402a31:18_10: jetavananti ettha anavasesaṁ samantato jetavananti attho.
atk-s0402a31:19_0: Obhāsetvāti ābhāya pharitvā. Vālukāyāti saṇhāya vālukāya. Na saṇṭhātīti na patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0402a31:19_1: Oḷārikanti brahmadevatāya hi pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhānakāle attabhāvo oḷāriko māpetuṁ
atk-s0402a31:19_2: vaṭṭati pathavī vā, tasmā evamāha. Dhammāti iminā pubbe uggahitabuddhavacanaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0402a31:19_3: Nappavattino ahesunti sajjhāyamūḷhakā vācā parihīnāyeva ahesuṁ. Appaṭivānoti anivatto anukkaṇṭhito.
atk-s0402a31:20_0: Dassanassāti cakkhuviññāṇena dassanassa. Upaṭṭhānassāti catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhānassa.
atk-s0402a31:20_1: Adhisīlanti dasavidhaṁ sīlaṁ. Tañhi pañcasīlaṁ upādāya adhisīlanti vuccati. Avihaṁ
atk-s0402a31:22_0: 129. Chaṭṭhe goyogapilakkhasminti gāvīnaṁ vikkayaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitapilakkhassa santike.
atk-s0402a31:22_1: Rittassādanti jhānasukhābhāvena rittassādaṁ. Bāhirassādanti kāmaguṇasukhavasena bāhirassādaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:22_2: Kaṭuviyanti ucchiṭṭhaṁ. Āmagandhenāti kodhasaṅkhātena vissagandhena. Avassutanti
atk-s0402a31:22_3: tintaṁ. Makkhikāti kilesamakkhikā. Nānupatissantīti uṭṭhāya na anubandhissanti. Nānvāssavissantīti
atk-s0402a31:22_4: anubandhitvā na khādissanti. Saṁvegamāpādīti sotāpanno jāto.
atk-s0402a31:23_0: Kaṭuviyakatoti ucchiṭṭhakato. Ārakā hotīti dūre hoti. Vighātasseva bhāgavāti dukkhasseva
atk-s0402a31:23_1: bhāgī. Caretīti carati gacchati. Dummedhoti duppañño. Imasmiṁ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṁ,
atk-s0402a31:23_2: gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṁ kathitanti. Sattame vaṭṭameva bhāsitaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:25_0: 131. Aṭṭhame idaṁ te mānasminti ayaṁ te navavidhena vaḍḍhitamānoti attho. Idaṁ te
atk-s0402a31:25_1: uddhaccasminti idaṁ tava uddhaccaṁ cittassa uddhatabhāvo. Idaṁte kukkuccasminti idaṁ tava kukkuccaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:27_0: 132. Navame āvahantīti niyyanti. Paṭicchanno āvahatīti paṭicchannova hutvā niyyāti.
atk-s0402a31:27_1: Vivaṭo virocatīti ettha ekato ubhato attato sabbatthakatoti catubbidhā vivaṭatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a31:27_2: Tattha ekato vivaṭaṁ nāma asādhāraṇasikkhāpadaṁ. Ubhato vivaṭaṁ nāma sādhāraṇasikkhāpadaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:27_3: Attato vivaṭaṁ nāma paṭiladdhadhammaguṇo. Sabbatthakavivaṭaṁ nāma tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:29_0: 133. Dasame abhiṇhanti abhikkhaṇaṁ nirantaraṁ. Āgāḷhenāti gāḷhena kakkhaḷena. Pharusenāti
atk-s0402a31:29_1: pharusavacanena. Gāḷhaṁ katvā pharusaṁ katvā vuccamānopīti attho. Amanāpenāti manaṁ
atk-s0402a31:29_2: anallīyantena avaḍḍhantena. Sandhiyatimevāti ghaṭiyatiyeva. Saṁsandatimevāti nirantarova
atk-s0402a31:29_3: hoti. Sammodatimevāti ekībhāvameva gacchati. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
